description:
Stable enough to imbue the first-time paddler with confidence, yet with enough agility and outfitting to take you on your first overnight kayak trip. The large cockpit makes boarding and exiting easy.

  • Lightweight and durable high-density polyethylene construction
  • Ergonomic Flex 4 seat is adjustable to accommodate a wide range of body sizes and shapes
  • Perforated seats with Drytec fabric drains water and dries quickly
  • Foot braces easily adjust to fit paddlers of almost any height
  • Recessed deck fittings minimize hang-ups
  • Bow and stern rubber hatches seal out the water to keep your gear dry
  • Rudder can be dropped from the cockpit by releasing the locking mechanism
  • Deck rigging holds spare paddles and safety gear
name: Boréal Designs Ookpik Rudder Kayak
